Occasion 3/4 Subjects undertake two control feeding trial , trial separate approximately 7 day follow : Subjects report Metabolic Laboratory ( PG-052b ) , Physical Education Sports Sciences ( PESS ) Building follow overnight fast . ( ) A cannula insert peripheral arm vein qualify clinician phlebotomist ; ( ii ) 10ml blood sample withdrawn aliquot generate subsequent analysis ; ( iii ) Following 15 min rest period subject give randomise order either control ( CONTROL ) - placebo nutrient drink ( per kg body mass : 0.33g protein anti-inflammatory bioactivity ; energy ~ 160 kcal 500ml water ) nutrient ( NUTRIENT ) - nutrient drink ( per kg body mass : 0.33g protein confirm anti-inflammatory bioactivity ; energy ~ 160 kcal 500ml water ) consume within 10 minute period . CONTROL NUTRIENT reverse 2nd trial randomise order . ( iv ) Whilst remain sit rest ( read , undertake computer work etc . ) blood sample withdraw 0 , 15 , 30 , 45 , 60 75 , 90 , 120 180 minute post feed . Total blood draw = 100ml per trial .
